mbean.name: AccessLogValve
mbean.description: Valve that generates a web server access log

attribute.name: container
attribute.description: The Container whose pipeline this Valve is a component of

attribute.name: directory
attribute.description: The directory in which log files are created

attribute.name: pattern
attribute.description: The pattern used to format our access log lines

attribute.name: prefix
attribute.description: The prefix that is added to log file filenames

attribute.name: resolveHosts
attribute.description: Resolve hosts

attribute.name: suffix
attribute.description: The suffix that is added to log file filenames

mbean.name: DefaultContext
mbean.description: Used to store the default configuration a Host will use when creating a Context

attribute.name: cookies
attribute.description: Should we attempt to use cookies for session id communication?

attribute.name: crossContext
attribute.description: Should we allow the ServletContext.getContext() method to access the context of other web applications in this server?

attribute.name: loader
attribute.description: The Loader implementation with which this Container is associated

attribute.name: manager
attribute.description: The Manager implementation with which this Container is associated

attribute.name: reloadable
attribute.description: The reloadable flag for this web application

attribute.name: useNaming
attribute.description: Create JNDI naming context?

mbean.name: FileLogger
mbean.description: Implementation of Logger that appends log messages to a file

attribute.name: container
attribute.description: The Container with which this Logger has been associated

attribute.name: directory
attribute.description: The directory in which log files are created

attribute.name: prefix
attribute.description: The prefix that is added to log file filenames

attribute.name: suffix
attribute.description: The suffix that is added to log file filenames

attribute.name: timestamp
attribute.description: Should logged messages be date/time stamped?

attribute.name: verbosity
attribute.description: The verbosity level for above which log messages may be filtered

mbean.name: Http10Connector
mbean.description: HTTP/1.0 Connector for Tomcat Standalone

attribute.name: acceptCount
attribute.description: The accept count for this Connector

attribute.name: address
attribute.description: The IP address on which to bind

attribute.name: bufferSize
attribute.description: The input buffer size we should create on input streams

attribute.name: connectionTimeout
attribute.description: Timeout value on the incoming connection

attribute.name: container
attribute.description: Container (Engine) processing our requests

attribute.name: debug
attribute.description: The debugging detail level for this component

attribute.name: enableLookups
attribute.description: The 'enable DNS lookups' flag for this Connector

attribute.name: minProcessors
attribute.description: The minimum number of processors to start at initialization time

attribute.name: maxProcessors
attribute.description: The maximum number of processors allowed

attribute.name: port
attribute.description: TCP port number to listen on

attribute.name: proxyName
attribute.description: The server name to which we should pretend requests to this Connector were directed

attribute.name: proxyPort
attribute.description: The server port to which we should pretend requests to this Connector were directed

attribute.name: redirectPort
attribute.description: The redirect port for non-SSL to SSL redirects

attribute.name: scheme
attribute.description: Protocol name for this Connector (http, https)

attribute.name: secure
attribute.description: Is this a secure (SSL) Connector?

attribute.name: service
attribute.description: Service that owns this Connector

attribute.name: proxyName

mbean.name: JDBCRealm
mbean.description: Implmentation of Realm that works with any JDBC supported database

attribute.name: connectionName
attribute.description: The connection username to use when trying to connect to the database

attribute.name: connectionPassword
attribute.description: The connection URL to use when trying to connect to the database

attribute.name: connectionURL
attribute.description: The connection URL to use when trying to connect to the database

attribute.name: container
attribute.description: The Container with which this Realm is associated

attribute.name: debug
attribute.description: The debugging detail level for this component

attribute.name: digest
attribute.description: Digest algorithm used in storing passwords in a non-plaintext format

attribute.name: driverName
attribute.description: The JDBC driver to use

attribute.name: roleNameCol
attribute.description: The column in the user role table that names a role

attribute.name: userCredCol
attribute.description: The column in the user table that holds the user's credentials

attribute.name: userNameCol
attribute.description: The column in the user table that holds the user's username

attribute.name: userRoleTable
attribute.description: The table that holds the relation between user's and roles

attribute.name: userTable
attribute.description: The table that holds user data

mbean.name: JNDIRealm
mbean.description: Implementation of Realm that works with a directory server accessed via the Java Naming and Directory Interface (JNDI) APIs

attribute.name: connectionName
attribute.description: The connection username for the server we will contact

attribute.name: connectionPassword
attribute.description: The connection password for the server we will contact

attribute.name: connectionURL
attribute.description: The connection URL for the server we will contact

attribute.name: container
attribute.description: The Container with which this Realm is associated

attribute.name: debug
attribute.description: The debugging detail level for this component

attribute.name: digest
attribute.description: Digest algorithm used in storing passwords in a non-plaintext format

attribute.name: roleBase
attribute.description: The base element for role searches

attribute.name: roleSearch
attribute.description: The message format used to select roles for a user

attribute.name: roleSubtree
attribute.description: Should we search the entire subtree for matching memberships?

attribute.name: userPattern
attribute.description: The message format used to select a user

mbean.name: MemoryRealm
mbean.description: Simple implementation of Realm that reads an XML file to configure the valid users, passwords, and roles

attribute.name: container
attribute.description: The Container with which this Realm is associated

attribute.name: debug
attribute.description: The debugging detail level for this component

attribute.name: pathname
attribute.description: The pathname of the XML file containing our database information

mbean.name: RemoteAddrValve
mbean.description: Concrete implementation of RequestFilterValve that filters based on the string representation of the remote client's IP address

attribute.name: allow
attribute.description: The comma-delimited set of allow expressions

attribute.name: container
attribute.description: The Container with which this Valve is associated

attribute.name: deny
attribute.description: The comma-delimited set of deny expressions

mbean.name: RemoteHostValve
mbean.description: Concrete implementation of RequestFilterValve that filters based on the string representation of the remote client's host name

attribute.name: allow
attribute.description: The comma-delimited set of allow expressions

attribute.name: container
attribute.description: The Container with which this Valve is associated

attribute.name: deny
attribute.description: The comma-delimited set of deny expressions

mbean.name: RequestDumperValve
mbean.description: Implementation of a Valve that logs interesting contents from the specified Request and the corresponding Response

attribute.name: container
attribute.description: The Container with which this Realm is associated

attribute.name: debug
attribute.description: The debugging detail level for this component

mbean.name: SingleSignOn
mbean.description: A Valve that supports a 'single signon' user experience

attribute.name: container
attribute.description: The Container with which this Valve is associated

mbean.name: StandardContext
mbean.description: Standard Context Component

attribute.name: cookies
attribute.description: Should we attempt to use cookies for session id communication?

attribute.name: crossContext
attribute.description: Should we allow the ServletContext.getContext() method to access the context of other web applications in this server?

attribute.name: debug
attribute.description: The debugging detail level for this component

attribute.name: docBase
attribute.description: The document root for this web application

attribute.name: logger
attribute.description: The Logger implementation with which this Container is associated

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The context path for this Context

attribute.name: override
attribute.description: The DefaultContext override flag for this web application

attribute.name: realm
attribute.description: The Realm implementation with which this Container is associated

attribute.name: reloadable
attribute.description: The reloadable flag for this web application

attribute.name: useNaming
attribute.description: Create a JNDI naming context for this application?

attribute.name: workDir
attribute.description: The pathname to the work directory for this context

operation.name: addValve
operation.description: Add a new Valve to the end of the pipeline associated with this Container

operation.name: getValves
operation.description: Return the set of Valves in the pipeline associated with this Context

operation.name: removeValve
operation.description: Remove the specified Valve from the pipeline associated with this Container

mbean.name: StandardEngine
mbean.description: Standard Engine Component

attribute.name: debug
attribute.description: Debugging detail level for this Engine

attribute.name: defaultHost
attribute.description: Name of the default Host for this Engine

attribute.name: logger
attribute.description: The Logger implementation with which this Container is associated

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: Unique name of this Engine

attribute.name: service
attribute.description: Service that owns this Engine

operation.name: addChild
operation.description: Add a new child Container to those associated with this Container

parameter.name: child
parameter.description: The new child Container to be added

operation.name: findChild
operation.description: Return the child Container, associated with this Container the specified name

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: Name of the child Container to be retrieved

operation.name: findChildren
operation.description: Return the set of children Containers associated with this Container

operation.name: addValve
operation.description: Add a new Valve to the end of the pipeline associated with this Container

operation.name: getValves
operation.description: Return the set of Valves in the pipeline associated with this Engine

operation.name: removeValve
operation.description: Remove the specified Valve from the pipeline associated with this Container

mbean.name: StandardHost
mbean.description: Standard Host Component

attribute.name: appBase
attribute.description: The application root for this Host

attribute.name: debug
attribute.description: The debugging detail level for this component

attribute.name: logger
attribute.description: The Logger implementation with which this Container is associated

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: Unique name of this Host

attribute.name: unpackWARs
attribute.description: Unpack WARs property

operation.name: addAlias
operation.description: Add an alias name that should be mapped to this same Host

operation.name: findAliases
operation.description: Return the set of alias names for this Host

operation.name: removeAlias
operation.description: Remove the specified alias name from the aliases for this Host

operation.name: addChild
operation.description: Add a new child Container to those associated with this Container

parameter.name: child
parameter.description: The new child Container to be added

operation.name: findChild
operation.description: Return the child Container, associated with this Container the specified name

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: Name of the child Container to be retrieved

operation.name: findChildren
operation.description: Return the set of children Containers associated with this Container

operation.name: addValve
operation.description: Add a new Valve to the end of the pipeline associated with this Container

operation.name: getValves
operation.description: Return the set of Valves in the pipeline associated with this Host

operation.name: removeValve
operation.description: Remove the specified Valve from the pipeline associated with this Container

mbean.name: StandardManager
mbean.description: Standard implementation of the Manager interface

attribute.name: algorithm
attribute.description: The message digest algorithm to be used when generating session identifiers

attribute.name: checkInterval
attribute.description: The interval (in seconds) between checks for expired sessions

attribute.name: container
attribute.description: The Container with which this Manager is associated

attribute.name: debug
attribute.description: The debugging detail level for this component

attribute.name: distributable
attribute.description: The distributable flag for Sessions created by this Manager

attribute.name: entropy
attribute.description: A String initialization parameter used to increase the entropy of the initialization of our random number generator

attribute.name: maxActiveSessions
attribute.description: The maximum number of active Sessions allowed, or -1 for no limit

attribute.name: maxInactiveInterval
attribute.description: The default maximum inactive interval for Sessions created by this Manager

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The descriptive name of this Manager implementation (for logging)

attribute.name: pathname
attribute.description: Path name of the disk file in which active sessions

mbean.name: StandardResources
mbean.description: Filesystem Directory Context implementation helper class

attribute.name: absoluteBase
attribute.description: Absolute normalized filename of the base

attribute.name: caseSensitive
attribute.description: Case sensitivity

attribute.name: debug
attribute.description: The debugging detail level for this component

attribute.name: docBase
attribute.description: The document base path

attribute.name: cacheTTL
attribute.description: Cache TTL

attribute.name: cacheObjectMaxSize
attribute.description: Max size of resources which will have their content cached

mbean.name: StandardServer
mbean.description: Standard Server Component

attribute.name: port
attribute.description: TCP port for shutdown messages

attribute.name: shutdown
attribute.description: Shutdown password

operation.name: addService
operation.description: Add a new child Service

operation.name: findServices
operation.description: Return all child Services

operation.name: removeService
operation.description: Remove an existing child Service

mbean.name: StandardService
mbean.description: Standard Service Component

attribute.name: container
attribute.description: The Container (Engine) processing requests for this Service

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: Unique name of this Service

attribute.name: server
attribute.description: The Server that owns this Service

operation.name: addConnector
operation.description: Add a new associated Connector

operation.name: findConnectors
operation.description: Return all associated Connectors

operation.name: removeConnector
operation.description: Remove an existing associated Connector

mbean.name: WebappLoader
mbean.description: Classloader implementation which is specialized for handling web applications

attribute.name: checkInterval
attribute.description: The number of seconds between checks for modified classes

attribute.name: container
attribute.description: The Container with which this Logger has been associated

attribute.name: debug
attribute.description: The debugging detail level for this component

attribute.name: delegate
attribute.description: The 'follow standard delegation model' flag that will be used to configure our ClassLoader

attribute.name: reloadable
attribute.description: The reloadable flag for this Loader
